merge_before_transcript:
monica: Ok, all right. It was an accident, I swear, all right. I was putting on myjacket, and the thing, and the lamp, and it broke.
rachel: Oh, please, Monica. You've always hated my lamp, and then, all of a sudden,it's just magically broken?
monica: Phoebe, tell her!
phoebe_transcript: Ok, I didn't see it, because I was putting on my jacket, but I uh want tobelieve you.
